attributes.action: Halt the theft of the tax payer owned Royal Mail
attributes.additional_details:
Royal Mail has had millions of the tax payers money ploughed into it, it is not the governments place to sell this off to private investors.
The government needs to take full responsibility for the running of our mail services especially because we as tax payers have had our money invested in providing this service.
Any sale of this utility amounts to theft from the taxpayer which politicians should be held to account for.
